result.arabic_text: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
result.translation: so that He will reward them in full and give them more out of His bounty[14]. He is All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.
result.footnotes: [14] i.e., Allah gives much in return for little.
